message: Hi Bob! I'm excited to offer you this amazing product for $14000. I'm sure you'll find it worth every penny!
Hi Alice! Thank you for the offer. I appreciate it, but I was hoping to settle at a more budget-friendly price. How about we agree on $11000?
Thanks for your counteroffer, Bob! I appreciate your interest. How about we meet in the middle at $12500? I believe it's a fair deal for both of us!
